content.text: Hi, I'm Matt. I'm the lead singer in a popular band.
Hi, I'm Sarah. I'm a huge fantasy fan and I like to binge watch the Lord of the Rings.
Cool! I love Lord of the Rings too. What's your favorite part of the story?
I love the characters and the world building. It's so immersive and you really feel like you're part of the story.
I know what you mean. I love the way Tolkien creates such a rich and detailed world.
Me too. I'm always learning new things about it when I read the books or watch the movies.
I'm actually a little jealous of you. I've never read the books, but I've always wanted to.
You should definitely read them! They're even better than the movies.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun when you're not singing?
I like to go to parties and just hang out with my friends. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun. I like to go to parties too, but I also like to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like fun. I've never been hiking or camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to get outside and explore nature.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what's your favorite song to sing?
I don't know if I have a favorite song to sing. I just like to sing whatever the crowd wants to hear.
That makes sense. I like to sing songs that make me feel good.
That's a good way to choose a song.
Thanks. I'm glad we're getting to know each other.
Me too. I think we're going to be good friends.
